name: Gjallarbrú
description: Calculates damage from staff like other weapons. At start of turn, if foe's HP ≤ unit's HP-3 and foe is in cardinal directions, inflicts【Isolation】on foe.  【Isolation】 Target cannot use or be the target of Assist skills through its next action. (Target can neither use nor be the target of skills like Dance and Sing, skills that neutralize penalties, like Restore and Harsh Command+, etc.)
